casebody.data:
John ROSSO, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 6219. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1931. Clint W. Hager, U. S. Atty., and Hal. Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, HUTCHESON and 'WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
